name: kitten adventures
description:
Game done in three days for the Minijam 80.

fight your way through enemies controlling one of 3 kittens, each one fills one of the classic roles, tank, damage dealer and support. The kittens you are not using are controlled by AI, but you can change control at any time, in order to use a kitten's special ability of avoid taking more damage with him. 

The limitation was using only 8x8 pixel textures. A couple of things might seem like texture but are not, are the area of effect of the special abilities and the claws effect, both are actually meshes.
